content: LS 15-22 Battery-powered sprayer Battery-powered sprayer with 4-gallon |15L tank, for spraying form release oil or water for silica dust control (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Water management systems and water tanks- ### FEATURES:Features Optimized spray delivery – battery-powered pump delivers up to 135 PSI of consistent pressure, with multiple nozzles to cover formwork quickly, evenly, and efficiently Optimized spray delivery – battery-powered pump delivers up to 9 bars of consistent pressure, with multiple nozzles to cover formwork quickly, evenly, and efficiently Compact and ergonomic – easy storage and transport with built-in spray gun holder, and wheeled design to help reduce back and joint strain while working long hours Less fatigue and fumes – battery-powered sprayers eliminate manual pumping and the harmful fumes of gas-powered sprayers, helping you work longer and cleaner Durable tank and accessories – 4-gallon tank, nozzles, spray gun, and spraying wand are built for tough jobsite conditions, helping you get the most out of your battery sprayer Applications Spraying form release oil Watering down silica dust during outdoor work ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water supply units Technical Data | Accessory type | Water supply units ### ITEMS- 2429823 - Liquid Sprayer LS 15-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x LS 15-22 Liquid sprayer
